Paragraph.Text: Creating a basic mining face is a lot of tedious, if done by hand. This machine will clear a 3 metre tall tunnel, in a 32m range. It won't affect ores, meaning you can use this next to your Ore Extractor to clear around. Wide-open work spaces are conducive to organised bases!

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Range: Power Capacity: Power per block: Destroys Ores: Max. Power Recharge Rate:
